Body:
client = Impersonator()
credentials = {'username': 'username'}
endpoint = 'http://%s:%d/%s' % (client.host, client.port, client.token_endpoint
    )
with self.assertRaises(Exception) as context:
    token = client.login(**credentials)
self.assertEqual('Either password or private_key must be provided to login',
    str(context.exception))
